honors_and_awards.title: IIT Kharagpur Young Alumni Achiever Award
Diana Legacy Award
honors_and_awards.description: Hosted by HRH Prince William at Kensington Palace. Awarded to 20 young leaders from around the world biannually.

honors_and_awards.title: Audi Environmental Foundation Scholar
honors_and_awards.description: One of 15 young leaders selected by Audi from more than 3k applications from 160+ countries to present to global Audi leadership in Brussels, and to participate in the OYW Summit in Netherlands.

honors_and_awards.title: Straubel Foundation Impact Leader
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded by Tesla Co-Founder and CTO J. B. Straubel in recognition of demonstrated leadership to further global sustainability. Includes monetary grant to support ongoing Green the Gene initiatives.

honors_and_awards.title: Associate Fellow of the Royal Commonwealth Society
honors_and_awards.publication: The Queen Elizabeth Diamond Jubilee Trust
honors_and_awards.description: Granted to ~50 people annually in recognition of “sustained commitment to improving the lives of commonwealth citizens”.

honors_and_awards.title: Invited Speaker at International Summits
honors_and_awards.description: Harvard Social Enterprise Conference, 2024 World Bank Group Youth Summit, 2021 Overseas Development Institute (ODI), 2020 World Bank Group Youth Summit, Washington, D.C., 2019 One Young World, The Hague, Netherlands, 2018 TEDx Talk, TEDx NIT Kurukshetra, India, 2017 Yenching Social Innovation Forum, Beijing, China, 2017 UN High Level Political Forum (HLPF), New York, 2015 UNEP TIYC, Nairobi, Kenya, 2013 UNEP TIYC, Bandung, Indonesia, 2011
